effect: Dark color slimming: delta_width -4% to -5%
score_formula: C1: Helmholtz irradiation. d=0.61. Modifiers: sheen>0.7 reverses (EX-01), fit>0.8 reduces (EX-02), rigidity>0.7 on light reduces widening (EX-03). On plus: reduced to -2%.
confidence: HIGH direction, LOW magnitude in garment context
source_text: Principle C1: Dark Color Slimming (Δwidth -4% to -5%). Koutsoumpis et al. 2021 measured d=0.61.

effect: Light color widening: delta_width +4% to +6%. Amplified on plus (+5-7%).
score_formula: C2: Boundary expansion. Zone-critical: light upper = GOOD for pear (adds shoulder width), BAD for inv triangle. Light lower = GOOD for inv triangle, BAD for pear.
source_text: Principle C2: Light Color Widening (Δwidth +4% to +6%). Zone-critical.

effect: Monochrome elongation: delta_VR -0.03
score_formula: C3: Unbroken vertical. Amplified: petite (-0.04), pear (-0.04), rectangle (-0.04), plus (-0.04). Reduced: tall (-0.02). One of most universally beneficial techniques.
source_text: Principle C3: Monochrome Elongation (ΔVR -0.03). Amplified on petite, pear, rectangle, plus (-0.04). Reduced on tall (-0.02).

effect: Red saturation mild slimming via attention capture: delta_width -2% to -3%
score_formula: C4: Low confidence. Zone-critical: red on midsection spotlights problem zone for apple. Red on hips spotlights for pear.
source_text: Principle C4: Red Saturation Effect (Δwidth -2% to -3%). Low confidence. Zone-critical.

effect: Full Helmholtz slimming: -5%
score_formula: BMI < 22: full slimming -5%. Gates: count >= 3 (EX-09), contrast > 1.5 (EX-14), width > 2 inch weakens (EX-10).
source_text: BMI < 22: full slimming -5%. Resolution from Conflict 1.

effect: Linear decay of Helmholtz toward 0%
score_formula: BMI 22-28: linear decay toward 0%.
source_text: BMI 22-28: linear decay toward 0%.

effect: Neutral - no Helmholtz effect
score_formula: BMI 28-32: neutral.
source_text: BMI 28-32: neutral.

effect: REVERSAL: +2% widening. 3D body curvature distorts stripes, making curves MORE visible.
score_formula: BMI > 32: REVERSAL to +2% widening (Imai 1982, Ashida 2013).
source_text: BMI > 32: REVERSAL to +2% widening.

effect: DO NOT SLIM. Neutral in real-world, mild widening +7.1% in lab. Delta = 0%, never slimming.
score_formula: delta = 0% (neutral), never negative (never slimming). Thompson 2011: vertical widen by +7.1% in lab. Swami 2012: neutral real-world.
source_text: Principle P2: Vertical Stripes -- DO NOT SLIM. The single most common wrong fashion recommendation.

effect: Visual movement redirecting eye from static body zones
score_formula: Good for pear (asymmetric flow past hips), rectangle (implies waist). Near-horizontal = emphasis. Near-vertical = elongation.
source_text: Principle P3: Diagonal Lines (30-60 degrees optimal). Good for pear, rectangle.

effect: SHR -0.03 (narrows perceived shoulders). Best for apple, inv tri, petite.
score_formula: Base ΔSHR = -0.03. Exception EX-15: bust>40" + depth>6" gaping, ΔSHR flips to +0.02.
source_text: V-neck: Base ΔSHR -0.03. Best For: Apple, Inv Tri, Petite. Avoid: Plus+busty (>D cup + deep V). EX-15: gaping at bust>40"+depth>6".

effect: SHR -0.04. Best for apple, inv tri. Avoid on large bust/decolletage.
score_formula: Base ΔSHR = -0.04. EX-16: exposure>30sq" nullifies line effect.
source_text: Deep V: Base ΔSHR -0.04. Best For: Apple, Inv Tri. Avoid: Large bust, large decolletage.

effect: SHR +0.06 (widens perceived shoulders). TOP recommendation for pear.
score_formula: Base ΔSHR = +0.06. EX-17: neck<3" = 'no neck' compression. Avoid: Inv Tri (amplifies), Petite+short neck.
source_text: Boat/Bateau: Base ΔSHR +0.06. Best For: Pear (top rec). Avoid: Inv Tri, Petite+short neck.

effect: SHR -0.02 (mild narrowing).
score_formula: Base ΔSHR = -0.02. EX-19: at >10" width, flips to +0.02 (becomes boat effect).
source_text: Scoop: Base ΔSHR -0.02. General, mild narrowing. Avoid: Wide scoop >10 inch.

effect: SHR +0.01 (mild widening). EX-21: on SHR>1.08 amplifies to +0.03.
score_formula: Base ΔSHR = +0.01. EX-21: geometric echo amplifies to +0.03 on inv tri SHR>1.08.
source_text: Square: Base ΔSHR +0.01. Mild widening. Avoid: Inv Tri SHR>1.08.

effect: SHR neutral (0.00). EX-20: on bust>39" creates monolithic upper block.
score_formula: Base ΔSHR = 0.00. Avoid: Petite, Apple, Plus+busty. EX-20: bust>39" monolithic.
source_text: Turtleneck: Base ΔSHR 0.00. Neutral SHR. Avoid: Petite, Apple, Plus+busty.

effect: SHR +0.05 (strong widening). Best for pear. Maximum harmful for inv tri.
score_formula: Base ΔSHR = +0.05. EX-22: upper arm>13" aesthetic penalty. Avoid: Inv Tri, Large bust.
source_text: Off-shoulder: Base ΔSHR +0.05. Best For: Pear (strong). Avoid: Inv Tri (maximum harmful).

effect: SHR +0.03 (moderate widening). Avoid: inv tri, large bust (gaping risk).
score_formula: Base ΔSHR = +0.03. Gaping risk similar to deep V.
source_text: Halter: Base ΔSHR +0.03. Moderate widening. Avoid: Inv Tri, Large bust.

effect: SHR +0.02 to +0.06 (widens). Best for pear (top rec with boat). Stiff fabric 1.5x.
score_formula: Base ΔSHR = +0.02 to +0.06. Stiff fabric multiplies effect 1.5x. Avoid: Inv Tri, Petite+busty.
source_text: Puff: Base ΔSHR +0.02 to +0.06. Best For: Pear. Stiff fabric 1.5x. Avoid: Inv Tri, Petite+busty.

effect: SHR -0.05 (narrows). TOP rec for inv tri. WRONG direction for pear.
score_formula: Base ΔSHR = -0.05. Diagonal seam invisible in same color: -60% effect on plus. Avoid: Pear.
source_text: Raglan: Base ΔSHR -0.05. Best For: Inv Tri (top rec). Avoid: Pear (WRONG direction).

effect: SHR -0.04. Best for inv tri, apple. Secondary WHR +0.02 penalty from underarm fabric pool.
score_formula: Base ΔSHR = -0.04. WHR +0.02 penalty from underarm pooling. Avoid: Petite (underarm pooling).
source_text: Dolman: Base ΔSHR -0.04. Best For: Inv Tri, Apple. Secondary WHR +0.02 penalty. Avoid: Petite.

effect: SHR +0.02 (mild widening). May be below JND (just noticeable difference).
score_formula: Base ΔSHR = +0.02. May be below JND.
source_text: Cap: Base ΔSHR +0.02. Mild widening. May be below JND.

effect: SHR neutral. Visual interest. Draws eye to wrist/hand area. Petite scale check.
score_formula: Neutral SHR. Petite: scale check required.
source_text: Bell: Neutral SHR. Visual interest. Petite: scale check.

effect: SHR -0.03. Lowers visual shoulder line. Avoid: Petite+short torso, Pear.
score_formula: Base ΔSHR = -0.03. Lowers visual shoulder line.
source_text: Dropped shoulder: Base ΔSHR -0.03. Avoid: Petite+short torso, Pear.

effect: WHR -0.02. Rectangle amplified to -0.03. REVERSAL on apple WHR>0.88 to +0.02.
score_formula: Base ΔWHR = -0.02. Rectangle: -0.03. EX-37: WHR>0.88 spotlights absent waist -> +0.02.
source_text: Contrast belt: Base ΔWHR -0.02. Best For: Rectangle (Δ-0.03). FAILS: Apple (REVERSES +0.02), Plus WHR>0.88.

effect: WHR -0.05. General waist definition. FAILS on apple (mushroom) and plus+busty (gaping).
score_formula: Base ΔWHR = -0.05. EX-38: apple WHR>0.90 + bust>38" reduced to -0.01. EX-39: bust>42" gaping.
source_text: Wrap construction: Base ΔWHR -0.05. FAILS: Apple (mushroom), Plus+busty (gaping). EX-38/39.

effect: WHR -0.04. Best for rectangle, inv tri. Apple at natural waist: mushroom.
score_formula: Base ΔWHR = -0.04. EX-40: flare from widest zone. Empire position fixes apple. EX-25: SHR<0.85 + flare>3" mushroom on extreme pear.
source_text: Peplum: Base ΔWHR -0.04. Best For: Rectangle, Inv Tri. FAILS: Apple at natural waist (mushroom). EX-25: extreme pear.

effect: WHR -0.06. Top rec for rectangle and hourglass. None if well-fitted.
score_formula: Base ΔWHR = -0.06. EX-41: fit>0.85 causes puckering, nullifies seam.
source_text: Princess seam: Base ΔWHR -0.06. Best For: Rectangle (top rec), Hourglass. None if well-fitted.

effect: WHR -0.05. BEST technique for apple. Fails on petite+short torso and small bust<33".
score_formula: Base ΔWHR = -0.05. EX-42: small bust<33" + empire = childlike proportion. Apple: BEST (bypasses midsection).
source_text: Empire waist: Base ΔWHR -0.05. Best For: Apple (BEST technique). FAILS: Petite+short torso, Small bust<33".

effect: VR -0.06. Critical for petite. REVERSES on tall VR>0.50, rectangle VR<0.40.
score_formula: Base ΔVR = -0.06. EX-45: short torso (VR<0.40) reverses to +0.03 (HARMFUL).
source_text: High-waist +2": Base ΔVR -0.06. Best For: Petite (critical). REVERSES: Tall VR>0.50, Rectangle VR<0.40.

effect: VR -0.07. Best for petite, pear. Avoid: tall VR>0.48, apple (midsection bulk).
score_formula: Base ΔVR = -0.07. EX-46: stacking with high-waist on VR<0.38.
source_text: Full tuck: Base ΔVR -0.07. Best For: Petite, Pear. REVERSES: Tall VR>0.48, Apple (midsection bulk).

effect: VR -0.04. Best all-around tuck variant. Best for apple, rectangle, plus. Rarely fails.
score_formula: Base ΔVR = -0.04. Best all-around tuck variant.
source_text: Front/half tuck: Base ΔVR -0.04. Best For: Apple (best tuck), Rectangle, Plus. Rarely fails.

effect: VR -0.02. High value for petite. REVERSAL: color mismatch delta>0.15 reverses to +0.01.
score_formula: Base ΔVR = -0.02. EX-47: wrong nude (Δ>0.15) = worse than colored shoe (+0.01).
source_text: Nude/matching shoe: Base ΔVR -0.02. Best For: Petite (high value). Color mismatch reverses (EX-47).

effect: VR +0.025 (HARMFUL). Almost never beneficial. Strong avoid for petite, short legs.
score_formula: ΔVR = +0.025 (harmful). EX-48: horizontal line amputates leg line.
source_text: Ankle strap: ΔVR +0.025. Almost never beneficial. Petite STRONG avoid. EX-48.

effect: VR -0.03. Best for petite, apple. Fails when competing hem breaks exist.
score_formula: Base ΔVR = -0.03. EX-51: two hems at different heights cancel.
source_text: Cropped jacket: Base ΔVR -0.03. Best For: Petite, Apple. FAILS: Competing hem breaks (EX-51).

effect: Diminishing returns: 1st=100%, 2nd=80%, 3rd=50%, 4th=20%
score_formula: Decay: 100%, 80%, 50%, 20%. ESTIMATED, not measured (Gap #10).
source_text: Diminishing returns: Multiple waist techniques stack with decay: 1st=100%, 2nd=80%, 3rd=50%, 4th=20%. These decay values are ESTIMATED.

garment_condition: High-waist + full tuck + matching shoe stacked
effect: OVERCORRECTION: total delta_VR -0.15, pushing past optimal into comical proportions
score_formula: Triple stacking on balanced body: VR 0.40 becomes perceived VR 0.25 (head-on-hips). Catastrophic threshold: VR < 0.30. Warning threshold: VR < 0.35.
source_text: STACKING WARNING: High-waist + full tuck + matching shoe = total ΔVR -0.15. Overcorrection detection at perceived VR < 0.30 (catastrophic) and < 0.35 (warning).

effect: Body-type-adaptive weight system for 7 sub-scorers
score_formula: Petite: Color=0.10, Pattern=0.05, Neckline=0.10, Sleeve=0.08, Bottom=0.15, Waist=0.15, Vertical=0.32 (height-priority). Pear: Sleeve=0.22, Neckline=0.20, Bottom=0.18. Apple: Waist=0.34, Neckline=0.16, Vertical=0.16. Hourglass: Bottom=0.18, Waist=0.18, Color=0.15. Rectangle: Waist=0.36, Bottom=0.14, Vertical=0.14. Inv Tri: Sleeve=0.26, Neckline=0.24, Bottom=0.16. Plus: Waist=0.20, Color=0.16, Bottom+Vertical=0.16 each. Tall: Bottom=0.18, Waist=0.16, Vertical=0.16.
source_text: Body-type-adaptive weights from Part V and Part IV body type definitions table.

effect: All silhouette-modifying effects scale linearly with fabric opacity
score_formula: At 50% opacity, a -0.06 ΔSHR from structured blazer becomes -0.03. EX-59.
source_text: EX-59: Sheer Opacity Scaling. All silhouette-modifying effects scale linearly with fabric opacity.

effect: Clingy fabric maps body contour, exposing undefined waist regardless of garment construction
score_formula: EX-62: Cling > 0.7 + WHR > 0.85 = contour exposure override.
source_text: EX-62: Cling on Undefined Waist. Fabric cling > 0.7 + WHR > 0.85: clingy fabric maps body contour at midsection.

effect: FAILURE: tie at widest point, gathered fabric adds bulk, mushroom silhouette
score_formula: Wrap dress FAILS on apple: delta_WHR reduced from -0.05 to -0.01. Use faux wrap.
source_text: Conflict 5: Wrap Dress fails on apple WHR>0.88: tie at widest point, gathered fabric adds bulk, mushroom. Use faux wraps.

effect: FAILURE: V-neck gapes, cross-body fabric strains, 'dressing gown' effect
score_formula: Use structured wraps with support for large bust.
source_text: Conflict 5: Wrap fails on large bust >D cup: V-neck gapes, cross-body fabric strains.

effect: FAILURE: tie sits too low creating drop-waist effect
score_formula: Drop-waist effect on petite+short waist.
source_text: Conflict 5: Wrap fails on petite+short waist: tie sits too low creating drop-waist effect.

effect: Fit > Structure > Color in magnitude hierarchy
score_formula: Conflict 4 resolution: fit_delta > color_delta. Fabric modifiers gate color scorer. A well-fitted garment in wrong color outscores ill-fitted in right color. fit_weight >= sum(all_optical_illusion_weights).
source_text: Conflict 4: Black Slimming is fabric-dependent. Effect real (~4-5%) BUT fit > structure > color in magnitude.
